contents.text: Thank you for calling Radius in San Francisco, where we provide total clarity to reach and convert your best B2B prospects.
For new customer inquiries and product information, press 1.
To request a personalized demo, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a product specialist.

navigationGoals: Schedule a personalized product demo to quickly evaluate Radius’s B2B prospecting solution.
Schedule a personalized demo to see if your platform suits my veteran-run consultancy
I want to schedule a hands-on demo of Radius’s lead-scoring and data-enrichment platform.
I'd like someone to guide me through a personalized demonstration of your product.
I’d like to schedule a personalized demo to see how Radius can help me identify potential research collaborators.

contents.text: To get detailed pricing and plan options, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our pricing team.

navigationGoals: Get a concise breakdown of pricing tiers and plan features to compare options.
Get a breakdown of pricing tiers for small, veteran-owned businesses
I need a detailed breakdown of subscription tiers and pricing for your B2B prospecting solution.
I want help understanding your pricing tiers and choosing the right plan.
I need detailed pricing and plan options for a student research project subscription.

contents.text: For existing customer account services and technical support, press 2.
To manage your account and billing, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer you to our account services team.

navigationGoals: Update my account billing information and clarify recent charges.
Change the credit card on file for my current subscription
I need to update my billing info and review recent invoices on my existing account.
I'd like to review my account details and update my billing information.
I want to update my billing information and review my current account charges.

contents.text: For technical support and troubleshooting, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Resolve a technical issue I’m encountering with the Radius platform.
Troubleshoot errors when loading my account dashboard
I’m experiencing API integration errors and need technical support to troubleshoot them.
I'm having trouble with the service and need technical support to troubleshoot.
I’m encountering errors with the API integration and need technical support.
